RequirementBookPage.title: Requirement Doc Generation
RequirementBookPage.subtitle: Enter the original requirement analysis content below to generate a requirement doc.
RequirementBookPage.needSelectSystem: You need to select a system before performing this operation.
RequirementBookPage.copyDesc: Content has been copied to the clipboard.
RequirementBookPage.copyFailedDesc: Failed to copy content to clipboard.
RequirementBookPage.unpinDesc: The requirement book has been unpinned.
RequirementBookPage.pinDesc: The requirement book has been pinned.
RequirementBookPage.placeholder: Please enter the original requirement analysis content here...
RequirementBookPage.confirmAndContinue: Confirm and Continue to Scene Analysis

RequirementEvolutionPage.title: Initial Requirement Analysis
RequirementEvolutionPage.subtitle: Enter your initial requirement approach, we will help you refine and complete it.
RequirementEvolutionPage.copyDesc: Analysis content has been copied to clipboard
RequirementEvolutionPage.copyFailedDesc: Please manually select and copy the content
RequirementEvolutionPage.downloadDesc: Analysis content has been saved as a Markdown file
RequirementEvolutionPage.downloadFailedDesc: Please manually copy the content and save
RequirementEvolutionPage.pinDesc: Analysis content has been pinned. You can generate a new analysis for comparison.

UserStoryPage.title: User Story Breakdown
UserStoryPage.subtitle: Use AI to analyze requirements and break down scenarios into more fine-grained user stories to help the team better understand and implement requirements.
UserStoryPage.selectScenePlaceholder: Select a scene to break down
UserStoryPage.parseErrorMessage: Failed to parse into card format, showing raw YAML. Please check if the YAML format is correct, or click the "Manual Parse" button to try parsing again.
UserStoryPage.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this user story?
UserStoryPage.copyDesc: Original YAML analysis result has been copied
UserStoryPage.copyFeatureDesc: Feature "{feature}" with all {count} user stories has been copied
UserStoryPage.copyFailedDesc: Unable to copy to clipboard, please copy manually
UserStoryPage.parseSuccessDesc: Successfully found {featureCount} features with a total of {storyCount} user stories
UserStoryPage.noSystemSelected: No system selected or system name unknown
UserStoryPage.storyContentCopied: User story content has been copied to clipboard

BookConfirmPage.title: Requirement Book Confirmation
BookConfirmPage.subtitle: Confirm the generated requirement book content and export the final version
BookConfirmPage.structureError: Requirement data structure is incomplete or field names do not match (expected scenes, contentBeforeScenes, contentAfterScenes)
BookConfirmPage.sceneDataError: Scene {index} data is incomplete: missing name or content fields
BookConfirmPage.architectureLoadError: Failed to load system information architecture
BookConfirmPage.exportDesc: System "{systemName}" requirement book has been exported
BookConfirmPage.updateTaskDesc: The system is analyzing requirements and generating architecture adjustment suggestions. You can check the results on the product information architecture page later
BookConfirmPage.emptyAiResponse: AI service did not return valid suggestions
BookConfirmPage.invalidFormat: AI returned suggestions in an incorrect format

BookWritingPage.title: Requirement Document Writing
BookWritingPage.subtitle: Use the editor below to create or edit your requirement document.
BookWritingPage.editorPlaceholder: Start writing your requirement document here, or choose a template or draft from "Content Load" to begin...
BookWritingPage.noImageDraft: No image draft available for current system
BookWritingPage.saveToLocalCacheError: Failed to save to local cache
BookWritingPage.loadLocalCacheError: Failed to load from local cache
BookWritingPage.noLocalCache: No local cache content for current system

RequirementSummaryPage.title: Requirement Summary Management
RequirementSummaryPage.subtitle: Manage requirement summaries to quickly find and reference key requirements.
RequirementSummaryPage.nameAndSummaryRequired: Requirement name and summary are required
RequirementSummaryPage.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this requirement summary?
RequirementSummaryPage.configNotFound: Default vector model configuration not found, please set a default configuration in settings
RequirementSummaryPage.configIncomplete: Vector model configuration is incomplete, please check baseURL, apiKey and model

SceneAnalysisPage.title: Scene Boundary Analysis
SceneAnalysisPage.subtitle: Based on the scenes described in the requirement document, analyze the boundary conditions and exceptions for each scene
SceneAnalysisPage.noScenesDetected: No scenes detected, please check if the requirement document format is correct
SceneAnalysisPage.optimizationSuggestions: Refinement suggestions based on boundary analysis
SceneAnalysisPage.analysisAccepted: Scene "{sceneName}" boundary analysis result has been confirmed
SceneAnalysisPage.analysisRejected: Scene "{sceneName}" boundary analysis result has been rejected, you can reanalyze
SceneAnalysisPage.analysisStarted: Scene "{sceneName}" boundary analysis has started, please confirm the result when completed
SceneAnalysisPage.optimizationRejected: Scene "{sceneName}" description optimization has been canceled, you can reoptimize
SceneAnalysisPage.exportCompleted: Requirement book content has been exported, System ID: {systemId}
SceneAnalysisPage.ensureContent: Please ensure there is requirement content
SceneAnalysisPage.confirmTaskCreated: Requirement book confirmation task has been created
